# registrations

**Instance Property**

A list of all documents registered with the system.

## Declaration

```swift
var registrations: [any IdentityDocumentRegistration] { get async throws }
```

## Registering and removing mobile documents

- **init()**: Initializes an identity document provider registration store.
- **addRegistration(_:)**: Register a document with the system.
- **removeRegistration(forDocumentIdentifier:)**: Unregister a specific document with the system.
